home.title: Welcome to LiteMaaS
home.subtitle: Your Model as a Service platform for accessing and managing AI models.

login.title: Log in to LiteMaaS
login.subtitle: Use your OpenShift credentials
login.bypassAuthentication: Bypass authentication for development and testing purposes

models.title: Available Models
models.subtitle: Discover and subscribe to AI models from various providers
models.description: Model discovery and subscription functionality coming soon.
models.loadingDescription: Discovering available AI models from all providers
models.emptyStateMessage: Try adjusting your search criteria or filters to find models.
models.modelUnavailable: This model is currently unavailable for new subscriptions.

notifications.subscribeSuccessDesc: You now have access to {{modelName}}. You can generate API keys from the Subscriptions page.
notifications.alreadySubscribed: You are already subscribed to this model
notifications.loadErrorDesc: Failed to load models from the server.
notifications.loadFailed: Failed to load models. Please try again.

subscriptions.title: Model Subscriptions
subscriptions.pageSubtitle: Manage your AI model subscriptions and usage
subscriptions.noSubscriptionsDescription: You don't have any active subscriptions. Start by subscribing to an AI model.
subscriptions.suspendedMessage: Your subscription has been suspended. Contact support or check your account status.
subscriptions.expiredMessage: Your subscription expired on {{date}}. Renew to continue using this model.
subscriptions.cancelledMessage: {{modelName}} subscription has been cancelled and removed from your account.

notifications.loadErrorDesc: Failed to load subscriptions from the server.
notifications.cancelErrorDesc: Failed to cancel subscription. Please try again.
notifications.cannotCancelDesc: There are active API keys linked to this subscription. Please delete all API keys first, then cancel the subscription.

messages.noSubscribedModelsError: No subscribed models found. You need an active subscription to a model before creating an API key.
messages.secureRetrievalMessage: Click the eye icon above to securely retrieve your full LiteLLM API key. For security reasons, this requires recent authentication and is rate-limited. All key retrievals are logged for audit purposes.
messages.keyCreatedMessage: Your API key has been created successfully.
messages.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the API key {{name}}?
messages.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. The API key will be permanently removed and applications using this key will lose access immediately.
messages.keyRevokedMessage: This API key has been revoked and can no longer be used.
messages.keyExpiredMessage: This API key has expired on {{date}}.
messages.retrievalMessage: Your LiteLLM API key has been retrieved securely. Retrieved at: {{date}}
messages.managementDescription: Manage API keys for accessing LiteMaaS services
messages.noKeysDescription: Create your first API key to start using LiteMaaS services.

placeholders.keyDescription: Optional description of this key's purpose

notifications.loadErrorDesc: Failed to load API keys from the server.
notifications.loadModelErrorDesc: Failed to load your subscribed models.
notifications.createErrorDesc: Failed to create API key. Please try again.
notifications.deleteErrorDesc: Failed to delete API key. Please try again.
notifications.modelsRequired: Please select at least one model from your active subscriptions

usage.title: Usage Dashboard
usage.subtitle: Monitor your API usage, costs, and performance metrics
usage.loadingDescription: Analyzing your API usage patterns and metrics
usage.noDataDescription: Start making API requests to see your usage statistics here.
usage.customDatePlaceholderDescription: Please select start and end dates above to view usage statistics for your custom date range.
usage.noApiKeysDescription: Create an API key to start tracking your usage statistics.
usage.selectApiKeyDescription: Please select an API key from the dropdown above to view its usage statistics.

charts.noDataDescription: No usage data found for the selected time period.
charts.noModelsDescription: No model usage data available for the selected period.
charts.modelDistributionAriaLabel: Donut chart showing model usage distribution

notifications.loadErrorDesc: Failed to load usage metrics from the server.
notifications.loadFailed: Failed to load usage metrics. Please try again.
notifications.exportStartedDesc: Your usage data export is being prepared and will be downloaded shortly.
notifications.exportCompleteDesc: Usage data has been exported successfully.
notifications.exportFailedDesc: Failed to export usage data. Please try again.
notifications.customDatesRequired: Please select both start and end dates for custom range export.
notifications.apiKeysLoadErrorDesc: Unable to retrieve your API keys. Please refresh the page or try again later.

errors.tryRefresh: We're sorry, but something unexpected happened. Please try refreshing the page or contact support if the problem persists.
